page.title: 09TUXFORD 4 +Comp.Sch. 7
page.content: being Dosco Engr. and Walkers Haulage. Dosco manufact. great amounts of large equipment for the mining indust. Walkers having started as a family haulage firm have grown until trucks travel across Europe trans. a great assort: of goods. Housed at Tuxford is co.s large store sheds and main offices, from which arrangements are made to ship goods all over the world. (7569) Again an agricul: area with main farm at Stone Rd end.In comparison to the above 2 sqs. this sq. has some arable with grassland,as farmer keeps sheep and beef cows. A little grain is grown, main crops are root. { TUXFORD COMP SCHOOL RURAL STUDIES l. There are ll animals in the Tuxford farm unit and they have cows, sheep, hens, pigs, and a horse.
